com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Interface BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasisBitmapDownloader.DownloadBitmapCommand
    Enclosing class:
    BasisDownloadInstructions

    public static interface BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor
    When the input stream related to an bitmap needs to be downloaded asynchronously, this interface enables to indicate it, and to notify the owner when the input stream has been actually downloaded.
    Since:
    2010.05.01

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDownloaded(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Should be called when the input stream has just been downloaded.
      void setAsynchronous()
      Indicates that the input stream should be asynchronous.

    • Method Detail

        Indicates that the input stream should be asynchronous.

        Should be called when the input stream has just been downloaded.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - should not be null
